## TocDataAttributes."data-toc-id" property

the `id` to use for this element in `toc` context. If not provided, this will be the element `id`<!-- -->, or generated by `toc` if element does not have an `id` either.

**Signature:**

```typescript
'data-toc-id'?: string;
```
